long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üö© Mc2 detects 50+ entities of sensitive data, and supports 10+ file types (PDF, Word, PowerPoint, etc.). With Mc2, you can redact a 10-page document in under 30 seconds, saving 95% of your time and effort!

üõ°Ô∏è Unlike cloud-based solutions that ship your file to their server for processing, Mc2 manages the data (identification and redaction) locally on your computer. Your data stays put, never exposed.

üìö Mc2 seamlessly integrates with 30+ leading AI and cloud apps used by people today, tracking the message and files you send to these apps to prevent potential data violation.

Types of Sensitive Data:
  - PII: Personally Identifiable Information (PII) is any data that can be used to identify an individual.
  - Database: Information related to databases.
  - Finance: Financial details like swift codes, etc.
  - General: General details such as specified links, etc.
  - Health: Personal health information.
  - Network: Network configuration details.

Supported Detection Formats:
  - Text Input: Directly entered text in the AI or cloud apps you use.
  - File Upload: Supports the upload and detection of various file formats.
With Mc2, step confidently into the AI domain, free from concerns about privacy breaches.
